ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor:Hi-Resolution Sony HAD CCd Image Sesnor, Effio-E
Optical Format: 1/3"
Total number of pixels: NTSC/PAL: 811(H) x 508(V)
Effective Pixel Array: NTSC/PAL: 768(H) x 494(V)
Horizontal Resolution: High Image Quality, 600TV Lines
Internal Lens: 2.8mm to 12mm Varifocal
Field of view: 2.8mm = 81 degrees; 12mm = 22 degrees
Focus: Manual
IR Lamps: 30pcs
IR Distance: 100ft
Minimum Illumination: Ultra low light performance, 0.01 Lux when IR LED is on
Electronic Shutter: 1/50(1/60) to 1/100,000 Sec
S/N Ratio: = 52dB
White Balance: ATW/PUSH/PUSH-LOCK/MANUAL/INDOOR/OUTDOOR
BLC: Yes
Gamma Corrections: 0.45
IR Wavelength: 850nm
Video Output: 1.0Vp to p75?, BNC connection
Sync System: Internal
Exposure: Auto/Fixed
Control Mode: On Screen Display Menu
Power Consumption: 1.5 to 3.5 WATTs
Power Supply: DC12V / 500mA
Operating Temperature: -10 to +50 Degrees C
Dimensions (W x H): 4.5 x 5.25 in
Weight  1.2 lbs (544 g)
For more Information Contact Our Sales Team At (650) 993-CCTV
60 Feet Cable & Power Adapter Are Included
ProductInfo.Name: Q-SEE QD6001D 600TVL 1/3" 2.8-12mm Varifocal Sony Effio-E Super HAD CCD II CCTV Surveillance Security Dome Camera w/ 30 IR LEDs 100 FT Night Vision + Cable & Power Adapter
